channel.title: Coding (new so dont really know if this is the right place or not )
channel.description:
i'v got 2 npc's in my server but nothing else i tryed a shop and the guy would let me in his shop but there were no items i need help with that and also skills i need help setting them up (its a blank client and server apart from the 2 npcs ) i really need help and if you put a donator system in there we can split it and you will be admin on the server..
Also i want all shops to be in varrock ( i want varrock to be the spawn point)..... ty for whoever helps :)

@strd3stroyer wrote:

I’ll help… But I need your teamviewer id and pass, I’m sort of new but I know everything u wanna know…

Read full topic

item.title: Coding (new so dont really know if this is the right place or not )
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

helloimwhite:

not gunna lie, if your source has two npcs, no varrock shops… get a new one lol, Project insanity is a good starter, google it. considering you cant spawn an npc, and you cant change starting co-ordinates, i recommend you stick to playing servers, and if you wanna start making them, research. remember: [size=36pt]GOOGLE IS YOUR FRIEND[/size] ;D

agreed

Read full topic
